verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am the Lord’s! It is the glad confession Wherewith the Bride recalls the happy day, When love’s “I will” accepted Him forever, “The Lord’s,” to love, to honor and obey.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am the Lord’s! Yet teach me all it meaneth, All it involves of love and loyalty, Of holy service, absolute surrender, And unreserved obedience unto Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
